relation: Great for these types of students
The has been no crimes so far on this campus. Public saftey is always around to make sure everyone is safe.
QCC has over Forty clubs! Each of these clubs are very active.
All students are welcomed. There are so many majors you can choose from and the school is diverse.
You can visit the Holocaust Center, Art Gallery or watch television during your break in the Student Union Building.
Food is good, however it is pricey
The professors are well educated and commited to their students.

-Use all the resources the school provides(tutoring, library, ACC , SUL and more) -Dont be afriad to ask for help, whether its emotionally or academically -GET INVOLVED! dont let your time at QCC past you by -Be serious, education is the key to success

This school is very wonderful, the staff make sure they assist you in any way possible. There are so many clubs and activities you can be involved with. Being at Queensborough gives you a chance to a brighter future.
pageTitle: CUNY Queensborough Community College Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
textBeforeTable: 07/01/2009 Reviewer is Accepted here and planning to attend soon. Reviewer has not been to campus. 2 out of 3 people found this review useful. 1 of 32 Camille from East Elmhurst, NY Check out reviews left by other students or leave your own review. textAfterTable: Categories Comments Great for these types of students If you want to do business, nursing , computers plus more this would be a go school to start off with Tips for prospective students Don't be to quick to no look and explore any school even community colleges. Just because you want to go to a university doesn't mean you going to get a better education. You can get the same education in the same field in a community college. Plus it wont coast you that much. Will enjoy being here Yes i would like to be here. Will learn a lot I can learn allot from this school it has allot of courses and classes that i am interested in. Also its far away from my Neighborhood so i can learn,meet, and explore new things as well Login to rate or flag the reviews Christian from Corona, NY 12/30/2011 Reviewer is A current student here. 1 out of 1 people found this review useful. 4
